channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cost Calculator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cost Calculator

item.title: CVE-2021-24820|2024-08-03T19:42:17.213Z -- unknown -- cost%20calculator
item.description: The Cost Calculator WordPress plugin through 1.6 allows authenticated users (Contributor+ in versions < 1.5, and Admin+ in versions <= 1.6) to perform path traversal and local PHP file inclusion on Windows Web Servers via the Cost Calculator post's Layout

item.title: CVE-2021-24821|2024-08-03T19:42:17.192Z -- unknown -- cost%20calculator
item.description: The Cost Calculator WordPress plugin before 1.6 allows users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks via the Description fields of a Cost Calculator > Price Settings (which gets injected on the edit page as well as any page that embeds the calculator using the shortcode), as well as the Text Preview field of a Project (injected on the edit project page)
